articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Cummins dismisses question on Siraj with one-word reply before IND vs AUS ODIs - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australia captain Pat Cummins' reply was not surprising at all, and neither was the question on India pacer Mohammed Siraj. | Cricket
articles.content: Australia captain Pat Cummins dismissed a question on India pacer Mohammed Siraj ahead of the series opener at the PCA Stadium in Mohali. Cummins, who is making a comeback from an injury break, had a… [+2674 chars]

articles.author: Aditya Maheshwari
articles.title: 'We've Picked Our Team for World Cup, Suryakumar Yadav is in it': Rahul Dravid Backs the Flamboyant Batter - News18
articles.description: Rahul Dravid has confirmed that Suryakumar Yadav will be playing in the first two ODIs against Australia.
articles.content: Team India head coach Rahul Dravid has once again backed Suryakumar Yadav and confirmed that he will be part of Indias final World Cup squad. The flamboyant batters ODI form has become a bit of conce… [+1879 chars]
